name: Otterna FREE
description:
This is a Single Version for Otterna!

Gamepad, PC , and Android Support!

Play with All Techniques Unlocked!
- Double Jump
- Swimming
- Apple Bomb
- Barrel Roll
- Sprint
- Super Swing

Use WASD to move, Use Space to Jump, Use Left Mouse Button to attack.
for mobiles, you can simply use on screen controls.
for Controllers, you can imagine it with PS2 Controls :)

How to use Techniques?

- Double Jump : Use Space after jump to jump higher!

- Swimming : Simply just walk into water :)

- Apple Bomb : use Right click on mouse to throw, and click again multiple times to explode it

- Barrel Roll : hold down Space when moving around

- Sprint : hold down Shift to run, attack and Jump faster

- Super Swing : Basic attack Enhanced!
